name: New Year's Day
description: Celebrates the beginning of the Gregorian calendar year.

name: Martin Luther King Jr. Day
description: Honors civil rights leader Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.

name: Washington's Birthday
description: Commemorates the birth of George Washington, the first U.S. president.

name: Memorial Day
description: Honors military personnel who have died in service.

name: Juneteenth National Independence Day
description: Commemorates the end of slavery in the United States.

name: Independence Day
description: Celebrates the adoption of the Declaration of Independence in 1776.

name: Labor Day
description: Recognizes the contributions of American workers.

name: Columbus Day
description: Commemorates Christopher Columbus's landing in the Americas.

name: Thanksgiving Day
description: Gives thanks for the harvest and blessings of the past year.

name: Christmas Day
description: Celebrates the birth of Jesus Christ.
